author: Herald Staff
title: Padres welcome Don Orsillo to San Diego | Clubhouse Insider | Boston Red Sox News
text:
Red Sox fans may not like the sight of this, but former NESN TV voice Don Orsillo is officially a member of the San Diego Padres family now.
Team president Mike Dee, a former Red Sox executive, posted this photo below of Orsillo today at Petco Park.
Welcome @DonOrsillo to @PetcoPark for the first time as a #Padre ! pic.twitter.com/gf4UVqtnCx
â€” Mike Dee (@PadresMikeDee) October 14, 2015
